answers.answer: You are right - it can be more difficult, because even as you reduce calories you need to have adequate sugar intake.I usually recommend that people with Type I DM actually meet with a nutritionist or dietician to put together a strategy.  The basic principles will apply - fewer calories, more fiber, exercise, etc. - but the route you take might be a little different.Take care!

question: Hi! I have type one diabetes and i was just wondering if you had any tips for losing 15-20 pounds? I know it's hard to lose weight with diabetes and i was just wondering if there's anything i should do to get started?
title: How to lose weight with type 1 diabetes?
